Vendors:
 - are users
 - apply to be a vendor, admin approves
  - must have paypal acct
  - provide all personal contact details
  - provide paypal email
 - vendor logs in
 - adds products
 - removes products
 - updates products
 - sales
  - reports
 - orders
  - in progress
  - historical
 - commissions
  - calculate
  - claim

Admin:
 - are users (staff)
 - approves vendors
 - disables vendors
 - views orders
  - by vendor, status, period

Customers
 - are users
 - place orders, system notifies vendors after payment
 - pay vendors directly using paypal
